title: HELP! Restarted Client to 'older version'
body:
I log in to League of Legends(Admin just incase) And it tells me 
"We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version" 
I then click "OKAY" then...
"There was a problem patching league of legends, we'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher" 
Then I click "RESTART" then it STARTS OVER and keeps going back more and more patch login screens!!

Also I did check my internet connection, everything is in order. I've updated Java and anything else I could possibly think of...
Also YES i did disable my antispam and malware and firewall temporarily but that didnt do anything either. 

I assume it must deal with the new arcade boss thing, i was playing for hours yesterday just fine with the same exact patch already updated. 

OFF TOPIC Side note: Riot needs to slow down on making skins and new champs. I invited a friend to play and he refused because 'there is to much to know'. Which i can see where he is coming from. I've had years of knowledge and followed every patch update so I'm all set but its hard to learn hundreds of champs and skins and skillsets and items. Please just slow down a little bit... Let people enjoy the new stuff you have made for a few months before moving on.

replies.body: I'm having the same problem since 30 minutes ago, an Infinite loop of that, and it's really sad that some people have had this problems since 3 months ago and Riot still does not have a fix. I honestly don't want to wait for the full repair to finish.

Hey Everyone I have fixed this issue. So this is caused because we all just got the new security update from windows last night.... Go into your security settings and Go to APP and Browsing Control and Turn it off completely!!!! This will fix your issue completely! and it takes 2 seconds!

Thanks for the reports here guys.  This issue from earlier today should be resolved now.  If you are still have any issues, reach out to us through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist directly.
I finally got in the game, But i only played a game then afterwords looking at Loot and it kicked me out and started again. So it seems off and on. Riot Please fix.
Set your time and date back one or two hours. It is a temporary fix, but it is working for me. I set mine from 8 PM to 6 PM and I am able to play again.
Had this problem 45 mins ago or so.. just turned off /on game a few times, restarted my wifi and it was good to go

This is happening to me, too!! I uninstalled completely and then reinstalled, but it still won't patch. uhgggggggggggggggggggggggg.
Then with a fresh new client it says "Unspecified error has occurred, please refer to the logs for more info"
the hextech tool thingy also doesn't even load/work
I'm also having this issue now. It started right after I finished a game of ARURF.

I finished a game and now I'm having the same problem, I wasn't able to honor anyone or see post game stats. I left the game to sit for a few minutes and came back, but instead of patching I got the same error. 

If this has been going on for a while, is there another thread that someone can point me to on how to fix it? I'm really not excited about deleting and reinstalling the game.
I just got this problem, i already uninstalled the game and re-installed but i keep getting the same thing. Pls help.
